name: In Extremo
description:
'''In Extremo''' (Latin for ''“At the edge”'') is a German [[medieval metal]] band formed in Berlin in 1995. Their music blends heavy metal with traditional folks and medieval elements, including [[bagpipes]], [[Hurdy-gurdy|hurdy-gurdies]], [[Shawm|shawms]], [[Harp|harps]], and [[Lute|lutes]].

The band is known for blending modern rock structures with historical texts and melodies, performing songs primarily in German as well as in Latin, [[Old Norse]], [[Old High German]], [[Occitan language|Occitan]], and other languages. In Extremo is also recognized for its theatrical live performances, which feature medieval costumes and [[pyrotechnics]].
